name: Baldi's Basics Playstation One Bundle Pack Full Mod "NEW UPDATE"
name_original: Baldi's Basics Playstation One Bundle Pack Full Mod "NEW UPDATE"
description:
Baldi's Basics Playstation One Bundle  Pack !

This is a mod of baldi basics that I made it for FUN ! 

Its have :

Baldi classic ps1 style

Baldi birthday bash ps1 style

Txt files : update log , ps1 help , guide , links and more...

This is a full mod but i will update IF I WANNA ! 

Current version is 1.2.5 

A dumb little advertise : do you wondered how baldi basic in PS1 gonna be ? Here is a mod that makes for regonize the old days COOL ps1 games and style and graphics . Haha ! Taste the 2 baldi mystman12 games in playstation 1 and classic style ! YOW ?

remember to get it FUN !

How to download and run ?

1.download the file

2.its for windows olny so..extract it

3.open the folder and chosse one of game files

4."HOLD SHIFT" and double click on the exe game file

5.set the resolution to "800×600" and set the "WINDOWED" off

6.click play and enjoy !

If you wanna put you PS1 CLASSIC CONTROLLER , don't forget to check "PS1 CONTROLLER STEEINGS" txt file !

At least , support me if you wan't ! Its by donate my aparat and MORE by download and like this game .

"(UPDATE SO SOON..)"  adding more features and fix STUFF !

New update arrives ! YAY

"((Update news))" i will change that with every update , if they will come !

Features and STUFF : 

+up to 17 achievements for classic and bday version ! TO SEE THEM FOLLOW THE STEPS : ITS EASY !

1.when the extract finished go in main folder

2.open that "THE ACHIEVEMENTS" folder

3.open one of game achievements you wanna 

4.enjoy ! And challenge yourself!
